content.prompt: Which of the following must be true about the 9 measurements, excluding the outlier, when compared with the 10 measurements?

choices.label: The median of the 9 measurements is less than the median of the 10 measurements.
The median of the 9 measurements is greater than the median of the 10 measurements.
The maximum of the 9 measurements is less than the maximum of the 10 measurements.
The maximum of the 9 measurements is greater than the maximum of the 10 measurements.
The standard deviation of the 9 measurements is less than the standard deviation of the 10 measurements.

topic.text: 1.6: Describing the Distribution of a Quantitative Variable

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Interpret statistical calculations and findings to assign meaning or assess a claim.
